# Government Tender Announcement
## RFI-B Mid-Shore Multi-Mission (MSMM)
### PW-__MB-010-29234

**Document Summary**

* **Procurement Reference**: PW-__MB-010-29234
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-12
* **Closing Date**: 2024-02-20T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **End User**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Regions of Operation**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Procurement Status**: Expired

**Trade Agreement and Method of Procurement**

* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Not applicable

**Overview of the Procurement**

The Canadian Coast Guard intends to procure up to six vessels as part of a new class of Mid-Shore Multi-Mission (MSMM) vessels. The proposed vessels will be designed and constructed to meet the needs of various programs at a national level and will provide a wide range of program delivery capabilities. The new class of vessels will serve as a platform for various missions including ecosystem and marine science, hydrographic surveys, Aids to Navigation (AToN), Search and Rescue services, and icebreaking.

**Government Objectives**

The Canadian government, represented by the Canadian Coast Guard, aims to advance Indigenous socio-economic development through federal contracting opportunities. The government also seeks to improve conditions for investment, enhance innovation performance, and build a fair, efficient, and competitive marketplace. Industry knowledge and expertise are being sought to determine the feasibility of the proposed Indigenous Participation Component (IPC) and to gauge the effectiveness of potential solutions proposed by industry.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:

Alison Owen
Supply Team Leader
Major Marine Construction Sector (MMCS)
Public Services and Procurement Canada
Email: [alison.owen@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:alison.owen@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 573-3671
Fax: None
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

**Attachments**

Please find attached the following documents:

* ABES.PROD.PW__MB.B010.E29234.EBSU000.PDF
* ABES
